question: Most common site of berry's aneurism is -
exp: Ans. is' b' i. e., Junction of anterior cerebral and anterior communicating artery Most common sites of Berry's Aneurysma. Junction of anterior cerebral and anterior communicating arteryb. Bifurcation of MCAc. Trifurcation of CIAd. Bifurcation of basilar artery
opb: Junction of anterior cerebral and anterior communicating artery
